author: bencomic

panels.narration: kjorteo, on not letting madtom down in the big zzt contest:

right.text: And we're like "WE HAVE TO DO IT FOR MADTOM :( HE GOT US THIS FAR"

left.text: I'm like the lovable loser sports team who's having their pep talk right before their big game with the #1 team in the world, where the winner gets enough money to save the orphanage

right.text: I'm the guy in the peanut gallery who says you suck!

left.text: And I'm a twelve-year-old hemiplegic in a wheelchair that cries as I masturbate with my left hand to pictures of Marge Simpson in the orphanage bathroom
Yes, and Flimsy is the guy in the peanut gallery who says I suck

title: let's do it for madtom! 's balls
